original_text: At that time, the universe will not continue to become worse and worse, as it does now. It will become free from that power. It will be free to enjoy great things from God, as God's children are also free.
korean_text: 그 바라는 것은 피조물도 썩어짐의 종 노릇 한 데서 해방되어 하나님의 자녀들의 영광의 자유에 이르는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: the universe will not continue to become worse and worse
It will become free from that power
It will be free to enjoy great things from God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께로부터 오는 위대한 것들을 즐기며 자유로울 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as God's children are also free
